snippet.title: The Incredible Adventures of Van Helsing II - Complete Pack Trailer
snippet.description:
http://www.gog.com/game/the_incredible_adventures_of_van_helsing_ii_complete_pack

Sometimes the fall of a villain only opens the way to more sinister foes. The incredible adventures continue, and Van Helsing, the famous monster-hunter returns to save the day again with the help of his charming, ghostly companion, Lady Katarina. The metropolis of weird science is on the brink of destruction and a new enemy plots revenge. It's the second part of the Action RPG trilogy with intense and visceral fights against increasingly stronger enemies, boss fights, a hunt for better equipment and incredible loot, tower defense sections and a great story with witty dialogue.
